levels.description: Stops attacking and gains <@ba.vup>{jaksel_skill_2[evade].prob:0%}</> Physical dodge; After a successful dodge, counterattacks the enemy for <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage (Counterattack frequency cannot be faster than <@ba.vup>{base_attack_time:0%}</> of the attack interval)
